title: Here’s Wear OS running on 2016’s Samsung Gear S3 smartwatch [Gallery]
content:
After running on its own Tizen operating system for the better part of a decade for smartwatches, Samsung finally embraced Google’s Wear OS last year. However, a clever developer has been able to install Wear OS on the Gear S3, Samsung’s 2016 smartwatch.

more…

The post Here’s Wear OS running on 2016’s Samsung Gear S3 smartwatch [Gallery] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The Gear S3, Samsung's 2016 smartwatch, now has Wear OS thanks to a clever developer and a custom ROM for the device.
